effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
